column4: I have the install cd for Ubuntu.  Is there any way to just begin the installl process without having to boot onto the live cd?
To use a non-gui installer download the alternate install CD. It's still really easy.
can I give a boot option to go into the alternate installer or do I have to download another cd?
the alternate CD is a different download. I'm not sure if the live CD comes with a non-gui installer.
